description.value:
When you hit a Fiend or an Undead with this magic weapon, that creature takes an extra 2d6 Radiant damage. If the target has 25 Hit Points|XPHB or fewer after taking this damage, it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be destroyed. On a successful save, the creature has the Frightened|XPHB condition until the end of your next turn. While you hold this weapon, it sheds Bright Light|XPHB in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light|XPHB for an additional 20 feet.

Attunement: true
